nodes.text: Cardekkia cheese was a type of cheese. During his childhood, the Duros Shriv Suurgav once entered a nest of bluebarb wasps. The resulting stings he received from the creatures caused his face to swell up to the size of a Cardekkia cheese wheel.
Cardekkia cheese was mentioned in Resistance Reborn, a 2019 novel written by Rebecca Roanhorse.
